input: The Great Wall of China is visible from space. It was built to protect against invasions. It stretches over 13,000 miles.
output:
The Great Wall of Cina is noticeable from space.

It has been acknowledged as being visible from the planet Mars.

A major portion of the wall was built to protect against invasions, with estimates suggesting it stretches over 13,000 miles. However, for most of our lives we are unaware of its presence until someone points it out or mentions it in conversation.
